Dracona dodged the shot and then lunged in the way and took shots for
Plintissa. "Now your tryingg to hurt a defenseless bot! The only reason
Suukie fored at Stinkbomb was because Stinkbomb fired at him, first, you
freak!" Dracona screamed. Dracona limped in front of Plintissa and fired a
fire beam at the eyes of Ramhorn...

defenseless
